name: PDLC
description: A collection of prompt engineering skills and workflows.

items.name: kickoff-heavy-bundle
items.description: Full enterprise project kickoff: PRD, Design System, ERD, API Contract, FSD, TDD, and workflows.

items.name: kickoff-heavy-2-bundle
items.description: Updated HEAVY project kickoff: Product Brief, PRD, FSD, Tech Stack, Design System, ERD, Stories, and Master Data Integration.

items.name: kickoff-light-bundle
items.description: Lean startup project kickoff: Integrated Spec (PRD+FSD+Tech+ERD) and Traceable Task List.

items.name: api-contract-generator
items.description: Generate OpenAPI/Swagger API contracts from PRDs.

items.name: design-system
items.description: Create a comprehensive design system with tokens, components, and guidelines.

items.name: epic-generator
items.description: Generate detailed Epics from high-level product briefs or requirements.

items.name: erd-generator
items.description: Create Entity Relationship Diagrams (ERD) from data requirements.

items.name: fsd-generator
items.description: Generate a Functional Specification Document (FSD) for a feature.

items.name: prd-generator
items.description: Generate a comprehensive Product Requirements Document (PRD) for software features.

items.name: product-brief
items.description: Create a high-level Product Brief to outline project goals and scope.

items.name: tech-stack
items.description: Define and document technology stack and architecture decisions for a project.

items.name: qa-test-scenario
items.description: Generate comprehensive QA test scenarios and test cases.

items.name: story-generator
items.description: Generate detailed User Stories from Epics or requirements.

items.name: tdd-generator
items.description: Generate a Technical Design Document (TDD) for features.

items.name: wireframe-generator
items.description: Create wireframe descriptions or boilerplate code for UI visualization.

items.name: project-kickoff-heavy
items.description: HEAVY project kickoff for enterprise, platform, regulated, or multi-team projects.

items.name: project-kickoff-light
items.description: LIGHT project kickoff for startups, MVPs, internal tools, and fast-iteration projects.

items.name: project-kickoff-heavy-2
items.description: Updated HEAVY project kickoff for enterprise, platform, regulated, or multi-team projects with integrated data updates.

items.name: add-feature-heavy
items.description: HEAVY feature addition documentation suite.

items.name: add-feature-light
items.description: LIGHT feature addition (Tech Spec approach).

items.name: fix-typechecks
items.description: Systematic fix-verify-confirm loop for resolving TypeScript errors.

items.name: start-story
items.description: Start working on a story with all relevant context documents auto-loaded.
